hero.description: The official organization governing Indoor Hockey and Field Hockey in Indonesia, committed to developing hockey from grassroots to international level.

about.paragraph1: The Indonesian Hockey Federation (FHI) is the official national organization overseeing Indoor Hockey and Field Hockey across Indonesia. Established in 1999, FHI is committed to advancing hockey from youth development to top-level international competitions.
about.paragraph2: As an official member of the International Hockey Federation (FIH) and the Asian Hockey Federation (AHF), FHI works to ensure high competition standards, structured athlete development, and adequate infrastructure to support Indonesian athletes on the international stage.

indoor.title: Indoor Hockey
indoor.description: Played indoors with teams of 6 players, indoor hockey combines speed, agility, and tactics on an international-standard court.

field.title: Field Hockey
field.description: Played on synthetic turf with teams of 11 players, field hockey is an Olympic sport that demands endurance, technique, and strong team coordination.

visionMission.title: FHI Vision & Mission
visionMission.visionText: "To establish Indonesia as a leading hockey power in Southeast Asia and competitive at the Asian level by 2030, with strong athlete development foundations and international-standard infrastructure."

performance.title: Performance
performance.text: Improve national team performance across all levels of international competition through intensive and professional training programs.

development.title: Development
development.text: Build a structured, inclusive, and sustainable youth athlete development system across all provinces in Indonesia.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.text: Build and upgrade hockey facilities to international standards in various regions of Indonesia.

education.title: Education
education.text: Enhance the competencies of coaches, referees, and officials through national and international certification programs.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.text: Develop strategic partnerships with government, private sector, and international sports organizations to advance hockey.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.text: Apply modern technology and training methods to continuously improve athlete performance.

blog.title: FHI Blog
blog.description: Follow the latest updates in Indonesian hockey, from match news to athlete development programs.

matchCenter.title: Match Center
matchCenter.heroDescription: Live scores, match results, fixtures, and standings for national teams & domestic competitions.
matchCenter.emptyLive: No live matches at the moment.
matchCenter.footerDescription: See complete profile, vision mission, and FHI achievements.

brand.subtitle: Indonesian Hockey Federation
brand.description: The official hockey organization in Indonesia, governing Indoor Hockey and Field Hockey to achieve international excellence.
